H0.text: Stem is the part of a daisy that supports the plant in the same way the trunk of a pine tree supports the tree.

H1.text: Flower is the part of a daisy that supports the plant the same way the trunk of a pine tree supports the tree.

H2.text: Root is the part of a daisy that supports the plant the same way the trunk of a pine tree supports the tree.

H3.text: Leaf supports a daisy plant in the same way the trunk supports a pine tree.

A4.text: It supports leaves, flowers and fruits
